alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Gonzales; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Caldwell, northeastern Guadalupe and northern Gonzales Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1200 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsbury, or 9 miles west of Luling, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Gonzales, Luling, Waelder, Kingsbury, Staples, Fentress, Palmeto State Park, Brownsboro, Delhi, Tilmon, Joliet, Oak Forest, Stairtown, Belmont, McNeil, Dilworth, Little New York, Thompsonville, and Ottine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
